cab.content: It- The report of the capture of VILLERS-DRETOUIiEUX is confirmed. We,, however, old CACHY. The French left was bent back, but a counter-attack was organised to restore the situation. The result is as yet unknown. 2. The attack at ALBERT is believed to have been a raid, 3. There is nothing of interest to report from the northern battle zonevGeneral Staff,War Office, S.W.1.24th April, 1918.Issued at 7.50 p*m.
